title: Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World
summary: A young man is transported to a fantasy world where he discovers that he can return to life after death, but each death takes a toll on his psyche.

title: Sword Art Online
summary: Players of a virtual reality MMORPG get trapped in the game, and the only way to escape is to clear all levels while fighting to survive.

title: No Game No Life
summary: A brother and sister duo, undefeated in gaming, are transported to a world where everything is decided by games, and they aim to defeat the world's ruler.

title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
summary: A middle-aged man is reincarnated as a slime in a fantasy world, gaining unique abilities and striving to build a peaceful society among various creatures.

title: The Rising of the Shield Hero
summary: A man is summoned to a fantasy world as the Shield Hero, and he must fight against waves of monsters while being betrayed and vilified by society.

title: Konosuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
summary: A young man is reincarnated into a fantasy world after his death and forms a party with an eccentric goddess, a powerful but lazy mage, and a useless knight.

title: The Saga of Tanya the Evil
summary: A salaryman is reincarnated as Tanya Degurechaff, a ruthless soldier in an alternate world filled with war, and she rises through the ranks to become a powerful leader.

title: Grimgar: Ashes and Illusions
summary: A group of people are transported to a fantasy world with no memory of their past lives and must struggle to survive by forming bonds and fighting monsters.

title: The Devil Is a Part-Timer!
summary: The Demon Lord Satan is transported to modern Tokyo, where he must work part-time at a fast food restaurant to survive and regain his power.

title: Jobless Reincarnation: I Will Seriously Try If I Go to Another World
summary: A man is reincarnated into a fantasy world as a child with a chance to live a better life, using his past knowledge to grow and build relationships.
